author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Chennai City police have registered a case following a complaint against a Villupuram resident for making hateful comments on his Facebook page.

City police sources said that K. Vijaybhaskaran of Besant Nagar complained that T.S. Arunkumar of Villupuram had shared objectionable comments on March 13 in support of and justifying the brutal murder of a Dalit youth in Udumalaipettai.
title: Hate message on FB: case filed
